summary: A training script that builds and fine‑tunes a Transformer‑based Denoising AutoEncoder (TSDAE) model on the AskUbuntu corpus to produce high‑quality sentence embeddings. It handles data loading, model configuration, loss definition, optional evaluation, training loops, and model checkpointing.
business_intent: Generate robust semantic representations for AskUbuntu questions and answers, enabling better search, recommendation, and downstream NLP tasks without requiring labeled data.
